amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to reduce funding for the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to $0.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, Salaries and Expenses, by $635,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 286 (Roll no. 626).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 286 (Roll no. 626).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
